content: ऊन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ऊन्-हानौ अच् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 2</ls>] {@--1@} Wanting, deficient, defective; किंचिदूनमनूनर्धेः शरदामयुतं ययौ <ls>R. 10. 1</ls>; incomplete, insufficient. {@--2@} Less than (in number, size or degree); ऊनद्विवर्षं निखनत् <ls>Y. 3. 1</ls> less than two years old; ऊनं वाभ्यधिकं वापि <ls>Y. 2. 295.</ls> {@--3@} Fewer, smaller. {@--4@} Weaker, inferior; ऊनं न सत्त्वेष्वधिको बबाधे <ls>R. 2. 14.</ls> {@--5@} Minus (in this sense used with numerals); एकोन less by one; °विंशतिः 20 minus 1 = 19; so °त्रिंशत्, 29; °पंचाशत् 49; अष्टोनं शतं 100 minus 8 = 92.
